full_summary:
**Tender Announcement for Bulk Aviation Fuel**
------------------------------------------------------------------------

# Reference Information

* Reference Number: PW-__HL-662-81384
* Solicitation Number: E60HL-210052/G
* Publication Date: 08 September 2022
* Closing Date: 14 September 2022 at 14:00:00

**Description**
---------------

Trade Agreement:

The procurement is subject to the following agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Tender Description**
--------------------

The Public Works and Government Services Canada invites interested bidders to submit proposals for the supply of bulk aviation fuel in accordance with Canadian General Standards Board standards. Delivery will be on an as-and-when-requested basis to various locations in Canada from 14 September 2022 to 31 March 2023.

**Request for Proposal**
----------------------

Qualified bidders may obtain the complete solicitation documents from the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/07/79ce12e55a486215e1531729e162e375/ABES.PROD.PW__HL.B662.E81384.EBSU000.PDF) website.

**Important Notes**

* This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes the previous bid solicitation E60HL-210052/F dated 19 August 2022, which closed on 29 August 2022 at 14:00:00 EDT.
* A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.

**Inquiries and Submissions**
---------------------------

For inquiries and submissions, please contact Pam Munz at [pam.munz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:pam.munz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or (613) 296-9133. Submit your proposals to the address mentioned in the solicitation documents.
